====================================================================================================================================

DevOps Engineer
---------------

I do things others can't or don't know how to do

* 🌍  I'm based in Russia, Orel
* 🧠  I'm learning DevOps engineer course on Netology
* 🤝  I'm open to collaborating on interesting projects
